channel.title: Julia on Jarvist Moore Frost
channel.description: Recent content in Julia on Jarvist Moore Frost

item.title: Links from Julia Land
item.description: Julia 0.3 Release Candidate 1 has quietly appeared on the nightly builds page; release notes in the very active GitHub repository - improvements to the REPL (tab conversion of ‘latex maths’ to unicode), and a lot of interesting linear algebra improvements. The inaugural JuliaCon has been held, and the presentation slidedecks are already online: https://github.com/JuliaCon/presentations; videos are coming but the upload date has been pushed back as they are edited and transcribed.
